Spicy Alfredo Sauce


Ingredients
1 tablespoon butter
2 cloves garlic cloves, minced
1 teaspoon hot pepper paste, or to taste
3/4 cup half-and-half
1/4 cup heavy cream
1 1/2 cups shredded Parmesan cheese

Cooking Instructions

Melt butter In a heavy saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir
in garlic and Calabrian hot pepper paste. Slowly pour in
half-and-half and whipping cream; stir. Add Parmesan cheese,
1/4 cup at a time, stirring after each addition. Cook for a
total of 4 minutes, stirring continuously. Turn off the
heat. Sauce will thicken as it cools.
